name: 2.1.5.Final
body:
- [**Question**] REFRESH_TOKEN_ERROR with KeyCloack Integration - Infinite redirect loop during the login  [#2119](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2119)
- [**Question**] Vulnerable to Log4Shell? [#2116](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2116)
- [**Enhancement**][**Impacts Documentation**] Add Jaas configuration support for Kafka storage. [#2101](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2101)
- [**Bug**] Still seeing "RuntimeSqlException: SQL error: Expected only one result row but got none" after 2.1.4.Final uptake [#2095](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2095)
- [**Bug**] Apicurio throwing io.apicurio.registry.storage.ArtifactNotFoundException while uploading a new artifact [#1926](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1926)
- [**EPIC**][**Discussion**] Missing features / bugs with Protobuf schema parser [#1671](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1671)
- [**Bug**][**UI**] UI - inconsistent display of modifiedOn [#651](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/651)
